text: Guangci/Fengtian Temple is an under construction metro station on the Tamsui- Xinyi Line in Taipei, Taiwan. The station is scheduled to open at the end of 2025 and the station code will be R01. == Station layout information == The station platforms will be located underground. Both Platforms 1 and 2 will be for Tamsui. Category:Railway stations in Taipei
